RaceEffectFactory - Class in effects
An effectfactory for a race game.

RaceMode - Class in game
In RaceMode the goal for each player is to reach the starting location of the other player or to enclose the other player such that he cannot make a move.
RaceMode() - Constructor for class game.RaceMode
 
random(int, int) - Static method in class grid.Coordinate
returns a new pseudorandom coordinate uniformly distributed between new Coordinate(0,0) (included) and new Coordinate(x, y) (excluded) within specified dimensions.
